origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FinanceAPI.get_financial_history', 'description': 'This function retrieves detailed financial historical data of a company based on its ID and specified period.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'companyID', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The unique identifier of the company.'}, {'name': 'period', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The period of financial history to retrieve, e.g., 1y, 5y, 10y.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'financialData', 'description': 'The detailed financial historical data of the company.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FinanceAPI.get_financial_history, 它的参数输入如下: 'companyID'是'ABC123', 'period'是'5y'.
